data.title: Sato Elementary
data.text:
Just how many cultures are represented at one elementary school? We think you'll be surprised. Take a look!

As enrollment at Sato Elementary School increases, we're adding another classroom space and other features as part of the 2022 Bond for students to comfortably learn for years to come. Take a look!

Sato Elementary just "wrapped up" a donation drive led by the student council. The drive collected supplies for the McKinney Vento Program, supporting BSD students experiencing housing instability.

After a hiatus due to the pandemic, a longtime ACMA tradition of welcoming elementary students for a day of art and fun has returned! This week, students from Sato Elementary took a field trip to ACMA to get an introduction to the arts. Take a look.
